text: Somatidia convexa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Broun in 1893. It is known from New Zealand. It contains the varietas Somatidia convexa var. sericophora.BioLib.cz - Somatidia convexa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1893
title: Somatidia convexa
